instruction: First, rotate right a tiny bit. Then, rotate left a lot.
back up for a while, then okay reverse a lot, and then turn right about a right angle, next um back up a tiny bit
First, bark. Then, turn left a bit.
carefully rotate right a lot, and then kind of move ahead some distance, after that please rotate right slightly.
move back a tiny bit, then kind of move ahead just a little, after that turn right slightly, then turn left a lot
